name.namePart: United States District Court Northern District of New York

originInfo.publisher: Administrative Office of the United States Courts

name.namePart: United States District Court Northern District of New York

titleInfo.title: Adams v. Corcoran
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting petitioner's 21 motion for Reconsideration / Notice of Appeal&Reconsideration of Judgment under FRAP Rule 4, treated as a motion to alter or amend the judgment under FRCP Rule 59. FURTHER ORDERED that the petition for habeas corpus relief under 28 U.S.C. ยง 2254 is GRANTED. FURTHER ORDERED that, unless the People NYS have initiated proceedings in the Kings County Supreme Court to correct the sentence under otherwise applicable NYS law w/in 60 days of the date that the judgment in this matter becomes final upon direct review, or the time for further direct review has lapsed, and the Kings County Supreme Court corrects the sentence imposed, NYSDOC Services must re-compute the release dates for Petitioner treating the sentence imposed by the Kings County Supreme Court in this case in June 1989 as running concurrently with the undischarged portion, if any, of the sentences imposed in 1981&1985. The Court Clerk is directed to enter an amended judgment accordingly; Signed by Sr. Judge James K. Singleton dtd 12/09/08 (cml) [ CRD traditionally served upon non-NEF petitioner @ NYSDOC Woodbourne facility ]

titleInfo.title: Adams v. Corcoran
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER denying petitioner's 38 letter requesting that 27 amended judgment be amended. Court declines to issue COA. Any further request for COA must be addressed by 2nd CCA; Signed by Sr. Judge James K. Singleton dtd 1/16/09 (cml) [ CRD traditionally served upon non-NEF petitioner @ NYSDOC Woodbourne correctional facility ]
